artist: After Hubert François Bourguignon Gravelot; Engraver: Charles le Vasseur
inscription:
Signature, and Inscription

on sheet below image in black: [H.Gravelot, inv  C. le Vasseur sculpt./ Sa valeur les vainquit, fa vertu les enchaîne].  in pencil on sheet : [1-495/Henry 4 of France]
life_date: After Hubert François Bourguignon Gravelot, French, 1669–1773; Charles le Vasseur, Engraver, French, 1734–1816
title: The Clemency of Henry IV
